desc: Bake something good with The Innocent Baker! We are a baking kit company that provides you with premium, pre-measured ingredients; an easy-to-follow recipe card and specialty baking tools. Whether you're an avid baker or just starting out, bake something new with us because we make baking easy.

layout.text: Pre-measured ingredients, an easy-to-follow illustrated recipe card and tools for your kitchen. Delivered right to your door.
